quotes.quote: Better than a thousand days of diligent study is one day with a great teacher.
If you have to put someone on a pedestal, put teachers. They are society's heroes.
quotes.author: Guy Kawasaki

quotes.quote: Teachers give students the tools to succeed.
Because of teachers, students become the best they can be.
The mediocre teacher tells. The good teacher explains. The superior teacher demonstrates. The great teacher inspires.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: When the student is ready the teacher will appear. When the student is truly ready... The teacher will disappear.
The best teacher is the one that helps them think for themselves.
The best teachers are those who show you where to look but don't tell you what to see.
A master can tell you what he expects of you. A teacher, though, awakens your own expectations.
quotes.author: Patricia Neal

quotes.quote: One book, one pen, one child, and one teacher can change the world.
quotes.author: Malala Yousafzai

quotes.quote: The teacher who is indeed wise does not bid you to enter the house of his wisdom but rather leads you to the threshold of your mind.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran
